headline: Berkshire Sells Major Healthcare Holding After 10+ Years
summary: Berkshire Hathaway Inc. (NYSE:BRK-B) is among the 11 Best Financial Services Stocks to Buy Right Now. It has restarted sales of DaVita, selling 200,010 shares between May 22 and May 27, 2025. The deal comes after Berkshire Hathaway Inc. (NYSE:BRK-B) made a $116 million sale of 750,000 shares in February. Despite the sales, the firm […]

headline: Fresenius Medical Care CEO Says Company Could Benefit From Obesity Drugs
summary: EXCLUSIVE: The dialysis company believes the impact of the treatments on its own performance will be ‘neutral to positive’ rather than negative.
